section.p: The configuration settings for APPthe AWS integration softwarethe ROR integration softwarethe OpenStack integration softwarethe TPS5 integration softwarethe vSphere integration software are provided in the following files in subfolders of the directory to which you extracted the oscm-app-install-pack.ziposcm-aws-install-pack.ziposcm-ror-install-pack.ziposcm-openstack-install-pack.ziposcm-tps5-install-pack.ziposcm-vmware-install-pack.zip file (<install_pack_dir>):

domains/app_domain/glassfish.properties
databases/app_db/db.properties
databases/app_db/configsettings.properties
databases/app_db/configsettings_controller.properties This appendix describes the settings in detail.

domains/app_domain/glassfish.properties
databases/app_db/db.properties
databases/app_db/configsettings.properties
databases/app_db/configsettings_controller.properties This appendix describes the settings in detail.
